name: Total sales and R&D as a percentage of total sales for companies with 1–9 employees, by selected industry and company size: 2017
description: Total sales and R&D as a percentage of total sales for companies with 1–9 employees, by selected industry and company size: 2017

creator.name: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics

variableMeasured.name: field_all_companies_total_sales
variableMeasured.unitText: Thousands of U.S. dollars and percent

notes: Detail may not add to total because of rounding. Industry classification is based on the dominant establishment payroll. Statistics are representative of companies located in the United States that performed or funded R&D.
sources: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics and U.S. Census Bureau, Annual Business Survey, 2017.
